```{r}
library(eegkit)
library(readr)
```

### Downsample the signals from 1000Hz to 200Hz
```{r}
#list files in the data folder
files = list.files("final_data")
```

Try on one file
```{r}
#load sample data
testing = F

if (testing) {
  i=1
  fn = paste0("final_data/",files[i])
  data = read_csv(fn)
  resampled = as.data.frame(eegresample(data, nrow(data)*0.2)) #from 1000 to 200
  
  save_path = paste0("data_200/",files[i])
  write_csv(resampled,save_path)
}
```

## Repeat for all
```{r}
for (i in 1:length(files)) {
  fn = paste0("final_data/",files[i])
  data = read_csv(fn)
  
  resampled = as.data.frame(eegresample(data, nrow(data)*0.2)) #from 1000 to 200
  
  save_path = paste0("data_200/",files[i])
  write_csv(resampled,save_path)
  cat("\n",i,"out of",length(files))
}
```
